name: Improved Gin Cocktail
description: The Improved Cocktail was originally more a template than a recipe. It was originally a way to take a basic cocktail and... well ... improve it, by adding another ingredient.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine genever, simple syrup, Cointreau (or maraschino), and bitters in a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir well to chill, about 15 seconds.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist a piece of lemon peel over the drink and rub around the rim of the glass.
